title: paraatpara
sahitya:
paraatpara paramEshwara paaravateepatE harapashupatE

(paraatpara)







anupallavi







suraasurar tozhum paavana sundara caraNaaravinda ananda

(paraatpara)







caraNam







ariyayanum kaaNa ariya jOti

aadiyandamillaa pazhamanaadi

purameritta mukkaN karumbE enRan

puNyamoortti subrahmaNyan tandaiyE

(paraatpara)
